data.title: Out Silent Planet
data.meta_description: Silent Planet (Out of this World) by Odgers, Sally and a great selection of related books, art and collectibles available now at AbeBooks.com.
data.text:
Soft cover. Condition: Very Good. Bernard Symancyk Painted Cover. (illustrator). 6th Edition By Publisher. 160 pgs. Science Fiction/Fantasy Novel! ; Painted cover depicts three men looking out of a window at the sun in a space ship. >>Cover scuffing; spine slant; Size: 12mo - over 6他" - 7他" Tall. Book.

Condition: Good. 1963. 7th Printing. 187 pages. Paperback book. Pan X270. Pages and binding are presentable with no major defects. Minor issues present such as mild cracking, inscriptions, inserts, light foxing, tanning and thumb marking. Overall a good condition item. Paper cover has mild edge-wear with light rubbing and creasing. Some light marking and tanning.

Condition: Fair. 1955. Reprinted. 190 pages. Illustrated paper covers. Pan book 213. Covers are visibly bent and warped. Light foxing and tanning to pages. More prominent to text block edges and reverse of covers. Light cracking to gutters and hinges but binding remains firm. Paper covers have light edge-wear and corner curling with minor foxing, tanning and scuffing overall. Spine has minor rolling and creasing.

Soft cover. Condition: Very Good/ Fine. Painted Front Cover. (illustrator). Second Edition. 190 pgs. Science Fiction/Fantasy Novel! ; Painted cover depicts three men looking out of a window at the sun in a space ship. >> This is a reading copy. 2" x 1" corner clipped from lower right front cover; cover creasing; staining to upper right corner of book, story is not effected. Size: 12mo - over 6他" - 7他" tall. Book.

Condition: Good. SHIPS FROM USA. Used books have different signs of use and do not include supplemental materials such as CDs, Dvds, Access Codes, charts or any other extra material. All used books might have various degrees of writing, highliting and wear and tear and possibly be an ex-library with the usual stickers and stamps. Dust Jackets are not guaranteed and when still present, they will have various degrees of tear and damage. All images are Stock Photos, not of the actual item. book.

Condition: New. &Uumlber den AutorC.S. Lewis was a professor of medieval and Renaissance literature at Oxford and Cambridge universities who wrote more than thirty books in his lifetime, including The Screwtape Letters, The Chronicles of Narnia, The.

paperback. Condition: Good. All orders are dispatched within one working day from our UK warehouse. We've been selling books online since 2004! We have over 750,000 books in stock. No quibble refund if not completely satisfied.

Novel - Softcover. Condition: Very Good. Macmillan Publishing Science Fiction Novels (Macmillan Publishing) Space Trilogy #1 - Out of the Silent Planet (VG+)Manufacturer: Macmillan PublishingProduct Line: Science Fiction Novels (Macmillan Publishing)Type: Novel - SoftcoverCopyright Date: 1965Author: C.S. LewisPage Count: 160Please review the condition and any condition notes for the exact condition of this item. All pictures are stock photos. The condition of the item you will receive is VG+. Our grading system is explained in the terms of sale section of our bookseller page. Please feel free to contact us with any questions. Product Description:The first book in C. S. Lewis's acclaimed Space Trilogy, which continues with Perelandra and That Hideous Strength, Out of the Silent Planet begins the adventures of the remarkable Dr. Ransom. Here, that estimable man is abducted by aliens and taken via spaceship to the red planet of Malacandra. Once on the planet, he eludes his captors, risking his life and his chances of returning to Earth.

Original decorated wrappers. Condition: Very Good-. First Edition Thus; Seventh Impression. Pages yellowed as normal for age. A few spots of foxing. A small spot of damage to spine and some fading. Slight wear & slight soiling to spine, covers & corners. ; 12mo; 192 pages.

Mass Market. Condition: Very Good+. Dust Jacket Condition: No Dust Jacket. Mass Market Paperback in very good + condition. Well perserved with a solid binding, squared, and the only interior mark is the previous owner's name on the front free end paper. "The first novel in C. S. Lewis's sci-fi trilogy, which tells the adventure of Dr Ransom who was kidnapped and transported to another planet." ; Cosmic; Vol. 1; 16mo 6" - 7" tall; 187 pages.
